ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Members of the MucoMicrobes study group:

Patrick Plésiat (Besançon), Jean-Louis Herrmann (Garches), Agnès Ferroni (Necker-Enfants Malades, Paris), Patricia Mariani-Kurkdjian (Robert Debré, Paris), Jocelyne Caillon (Nantes), Laurence Delhaes (Bordeaux), Anne Doléans-Jordheim (Lyon), Jean-Philippe Bouchara (Angers), Vincent Cattoir (Rennes), Geneviève Héry-Arnaud (Brest), Anne-Laure Roux (Garches), Hélène Guet-Revillet (Toulouse), Sophie Vallet (Brest), Emilie Cardot-Martin (Foch, Paris), Nathalie Soismier (Créteil), Catherine Eckert (Hôpitaux universitaires de l'Est parisien), Guenièvre Imbert (Toulon), Thomas Guillard (Reims), Florence Morfin (Lyon).

We thank Helen McCombie from Brest University Translation Office for revision of the English manuscript. We also thank biostatisticians (Tanniou Julien) from Clinical Investigation Centre of Brest University Hospital.
